span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v./adj. 饱足，过分满足： to satisfy fully or to excess
【例】 A long drink of water satiated my thirst. 一顿痛饮之后我的口渴得到了缓解
【近】 replete, sate, stuff, surfeit
【反】 tantalize 挑逗，不去满足

【记】 satisfy，sate 饱 + ate 吃
